replies.body: Pffft. How about getting champ shards when you own every single champ?
Save 3 champ shard when you own all champs, so when a new champ comes out, you get it for free.
But I own all champs, 20 runes pages, all the runes I want, and have more IP than I know what to do with ._.

Not as bad as getting Toxic Mundo skin shard... TWICE.

{{champion:51}}
Lucky, I got Urgot champion shards twice. In a row. Best of all, I already have Urgot

> [{quoted}](name=Best Kog NA,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=leeP0r15,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-09-23T02:24:06.277+0000)
>
> Lucky, I got Urgot champion shards twice. In a row. Best of all, I already have Urgot

{{champion:6}} {{item:3070}}
How is that bad? All I get is champ shards.
not as bad as getting 3 Keys without any chest T_T
See, this would have been funnier if it was just a picture of the chest.
at least it's usable in game, i got a teemo icon once #feelsbadman #relatable
I have only gotten 1 ward skin (and it was from the very first chest I opened) so that seems pretty rare to me

Not as bad as getting a mecha icon. :l

But free is free I suppose :B

I got the legendary and epic skins for champs I don't play. Lol.

If I get Lunar Goddess Diana... I will buy RP, just to thank Riot.
